DOC.brief_summary: The study objective evaluate gastrointestinal tolerance infant formula supplement prebiotics .
DOC.criteria: Infant judge good health . Infant singleton full term birth gestational age 3742 week . Infant 's birth weight > 2490 g ( ~5 lbs 8 oz. ) . Infant 0 8 day age enrollment . Parent ( ) confirm intention feed infant study product ( formulafed infant ) human milk ( human milkfed infant ) sole source nutrition duration study . Parent ( ) confirm intention administer vitamin mineral supplement , solid food juice infant enrollment duration study . Adverse maternal , fetal infant medical history effect tolerance , growth , and/or development . Infants use medication , home remedy , herbal preparation , probiotic rehydration fluid might affect GI tolerance . Mother intend use combination breast formula feeding . Participation another study approve concomitant study AN .
